items.composition: Body: 90% Nylon, 10% Spandex/ String: 75% Polyester, 13% Spandex, 12% Cupro/ Filter: Polypropylene
items.longDescription:
- The inner and outer materials have been changed for improved breathability.
- Can be fine-tuned for a more comfortable fit.
- Size indicator makes it easy to find yours.

High-performance 3-tier structure.
First layer of AIRism Mesh is smooth and highly breathable.
Second layer cuts up to 99% of particles such as bacteria and pollen.
Third layer uses the same AIRism Mesh as the first layer for improved breathability.
items.name: AIRism Face Mask (Pack of 3)
items.shortDescription: High-performance filter keeps you dry from splashes. Washable AIRism mask. Evolved design to be easier to breath in.

items.longDescription:
- DRY EX function added.
- With antibacterial and odor-neutralizing functions.
- Updated collar design so it’s a more versatile shirt.
- Specially woven to reduce seams. Ergonomically placed mesh holes enhance breathability.
- The front of the shirt is now made of jersey, so that the design can be worn in social settings as well. - Ultra quick-drying properties recognized by athletes. It dries in roughly half the time it takes for cotton to dry, so sweat doesn’t stick to the skin as much.
- Speckled yarn creates gradation effect.
items.name: MEN DRY-EX Crew Neck Short Sleeve T-Shirt
items.shortDescription: Evolved design ideal for sports or everyday wear. Outstanding quick-drying capability while remaining smooth to the touch.

items.longDescription:
- Uses DRY-EX, an extremely fast drying fabric that is also approved by athletes.
- The drying speed is about half that of cotton, so it won't stick to your skin. We've added anti-microbial and anti-odor properties to keep you fresh even in sweaty situations.
- Has a highly breathable woven surface to keep you cool, and won't cling to your skin.
- The kit includes mesh holes that are designed to retain heat while allowing sweat to dry quickly, while also being breathable.
- No side lines, with a tubular weave for a softer touch.
- The comfy fit and colors make this item perfect for playing sports or just lounging around.
items.name: MEN DRY-EX Crew Neck Short Sleeve T-Shirt
items.shortDescription: Incredibly quick drying, breathable, and cool. This handy item is great for any occasion.

items.longDescription:
- With Cool Touch, absorbent, quick-drying, and moisture-wicking functions.
- Versatile design in basic colors.
items.name: AIRism Bedsheet (Queen)
items.shortDescription: For a cool, comfortable night’s sleep.

Machine wash cold, gentle cycle
Do not tumble dry

items.freeInformation: - The images shown may include colors that are not available.
items.longDescription:
The Louvre × Yu Nagaba

In the partnership which began with the Louvre in 2021, UNIQLO supports educational programs in the museum and releases collaborative products on an ongoing basis. For this new collection, selecting from among more than 35,000 pieces, artist Yu Nagaba has created special artwork of masterpieces such as Da Vinci's "Mona Lisa" and Vermeer's "Astronomer".

Yu Nagaba
Artist. Known for his works drawn with simple lines, he is active in various fields such as magazines, books, advertisements, and collaborations with apparel brands, in addition to his activities as an artist.

Inspired by The Astronomer / Johannes VERMEER / 1668
© Musée du Louvre
©2022 Yu Nagaba"
items.name: The Louvre UT (Short Sleeve Graphic T-Shirt)
items.shortDescription: The Louvre’s masterpieces drawn by Japan’s contemporary artist Yu Nagaba are now available from UT!

items.freeInformation: - The images shown may include colors that are not available.
items.longDescription:
Monochrome Mickey Mouse Art by Joshua Vides

Southern California based artist Joshua Vides drew exclusive artworks for Uniqlo UT, featuring the most loved Disney character Mickey Mouse and his friends. Enjoy the new collection where Mickey Mouse and Art come together!

Joshua Vides
Joshua Vides is a Southern California based illustrator and visual artist. His work defines the premise of pop art through immersive installations and range of limited products. His latest concept, Reality to Idea, highlights the shape and form of objects through a Black & White comic-like perspective.

©Disney
items.name: Monochrome Mickey UT (Short Sleeve Graphic T-Shirt)
items.shortDescription: Check out the new artistic UT collection for Mickey Mouse and his friends!

items.freeInformation: - The images shown may include colors that are not available.
items.longDescription:
Magnum Photos

From "Magnum Photos", the international photographers' collective established in 1947, we have selected works by photographers of various backgrounds which are reminiscent of visions of travel. Please enjoy the experience of thinking and dreaming of visiting a foreign city through these T-shirts.

Alec Soth
Born in Minneapolis, Minnesota in 1969, Alec Soth has been an exponent of the American tradition of “on-the-road photography,” critically acclaimed since he began his career. His works are in collection in major museums such as The San Francisco Museum of Modern Art and the Museum of Fine Arts, Houston. He established “Little Brown Mushroom” publishing company in 2008, known for its superb photobooks. He joined Magnum in 2004.

© Alec Soth/Magnum Photos
items.name: Magnum Photos UT (Short Sleeve Graphic T-Shirt)
items.shortDescription: Magnum Photos, the world leading photographers' collective, is now available from UT!

items.freeInformation: - The images shown may include colors that are not available.
items.longDescription:
Magnum Photos

From "Magnum Photos", the international photographers' collective established in 1947, we have selected works by photographers of various backgrounds which are reminiscent of visions of travel. Please enjoy the experience of thinking and dreaming of visiting a foreign city through these T-shirts.

Alessandra Sanguinetti
Born in New York in 1968, Alessandra Sanguinetti lived in Argentina from 1970 to 2003. She was the recipient of numerous awards such as a Guggenheim Foundation Fellowship (2000) and the Fondation d'entreprise Hermès / Aperture Foundation Fellowship (2015). In addition to The Museum of Modern Art in New York, The San Francisco Museum of Modern Art and the Museum of Fine Arts, Boston, her works are kept in private collections. She joined Magnum in 2007.

© Alessandra Sanguinetti/Magnum Photos
items.name: Magnum Photos UT (Short Sleeve Graphic T-Shirt)
items.shortDescription: Magnum Photos, the world leading photographers' collective, is now available from UT!
